Off Piste Lesson
avr. 2022
Our 2 kids aged 14 and 15 had an off piste lesson with Gavin from The Development Center in April this year. They described it as "the best thing they have ever done". We all watched the GoPro video afterwards and I was amazed at what they did. They covered an amazing amount of ground in the time they had including 2 trips from the top of the funicular back down to Val Claret which was almost non stop off piste. Gavin was very friendly an easy going which suited our kids perfectly, a rucksack was provided with all the off piste safety gear inside including an avalanche transceiver and a collapsible shovel. I would not hesitate to recommend TDC for their professionalism and had no qualms about sending the kids off with Gavin for the morning. Off Piste Lesson
avr. 2022
Our 2 kids aged 14 and 15 had an off piste lesson with Gavin from The Development Center in April this year. They described it as "the best thing they have ever done". We all watched the GoPro video afterwards and I was amazed at what they did. They covered an amazing amount of ground in the time they had including 2 trips from the top of the funicular back down to Val Claret which was almost non stop off piste. Gavin was very friendly an easy going which suited our kids perfectly, a rucksack was provided with all the off piste safety gear inside including an avalanche transceiver and a collapsible shovel. I would not hesitate to recommend TDC for their professionalism and had no qualms about sending the kids off with Gavin for the morning. Definitely something I will be sorting out for the kids on our next trip.
